name: Infected (itch)
description:
A short puzzlescript game where when the player pushes a block that block becomes infected so the player needs to push blocks using other blocks.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=148f8ab4f9c51b32caf5b81189b3b85f

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=148f8ab4f9c51b32caf5b81189b3b85f
